info.title: Micro Focus Content Manager
info.description: Micro Focus Content Manager is a governance-based enterprise content management system designed to help government agencies, regulated industries and global organizations manage their business content from creation to disposal. Connect to Micro Focus Content Manager to perform actions including creating or updating records or locations, uploading or downloading electronic files, searching and more. (1.0.3.736)

get.description: Search for Locations (Fetch a collection of Locations using a search string)

parameters.name: userToImpersonate
parameters.description: The Network Login or Alternative Login of the Location in CM to impersonate

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Enter a search query, e.g. 'all' to get all objects.

parameters.name: ApplyDefaults
parameters.description: True to apply the user's default filter and sort to this search

parameters.name: CountResults
parameters.description: True to include a count of the results

parameters.name: ExcludeCount
parameters.description: True to exclude a count of the results

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A space separated list of search clauses to apply as a filter.

parameters.name: fromSearch
parameters.description: The Unique ID of a Saved Search from which to construct this search

parameters.name: descendantProperties
parameters.description: A comma separated list of object properties, applies only to object properties of this and lower level properties e.g. RecordNumber,RecordTitle

parameters.name: IncludePropertyDefs
parameters.description: True to return an array of the Property Definitions used by properties in this response

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Set one or more of the options typically set in User Options for this search only.  Use ids from the /PropertyDef?Get=SearchOptions service, append a minus sign to set to false, otherwise true is assumed.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: A comma separated list of object properties, e.g. RecordNumber,RecordTitle

parameters.name: propertySets
parameters.description: One or more pre-defined property sets, select from DataGridVisible, Detailed, FromSearch, All or a custom property set as defined in your service configuration

parameters.name: PropertyValue
parameters.description: Include the raw value, the string value, or both in the results

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items to return in each page of results

parameters.name: purpose
parameters.description: A special property to filter search results based on object Purpose enum values

parameters.name: purposeExtra
parameters.description: Necessary as a supplement to some purposes.  The ObjectDef service provides information on the enum or TrimMainObject type to specify, in particular ObjectDef.ExtraPurposeEnums, ObjectDef.ExtraPurposeObjectTypes and HaveExtraPurposeParameter.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: A comma separated list of search clause Ids

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The position in the result set to start, empty (or 1) to start at the beginning, 2 to start at the second object, 3 at the third, etc

parameters.name: stringDisplayType
parameters.description: If returning the string value which format to use

ByPassSave.description: True to not save the object.  One use of this is to set one or more properties on a Record post and return the data entry form.  The data entry form will then reflect the various properties set on the original Record.

ChangePositionWithinFavorites.description: When search for favorites they will be returned in this order unless another sort is used.

ChangePositionWithinUserLabel.description: When searching by UserLabel they wil be returned in this order unless another sort is used.,

comments.description: Comments to go in the Record Notes when the document is uploaded.

FailOnWarnings.description: True to not create/save an object if there are any warnings.

RecordFilePath.description: The filename as it appears in the Uploads folder.

keepBookedOut.description: True to leave the Record checked out after the electronic document is uploaded.

MakeActive.description: Reverts the state of the record (and any of its contents) so that it is no longer inactive. When processing contents you can specify whether the task should halt if any failures occur.

MakeInactive.description: Sets the dateInactive for this record and any of its contents. When processing contents you can specify whether the task should halt if any failures occur.

makeNewRevision.description: True to create a new Revision with this Electronic document false to replace the current Revision.

RecordNewPartCreationRule.description: Unique ID of Auto Part Creation Rule

RecordOtherContact.description: Unique ID or email address of Location

RecordOwnerLocation.description: Unique ID or email address of Location

RecordNewType.description: Leave as Default unless creating a New Part Version or Copy.

FailOnWarnings.description: True to not create/save an object if there are any warnings.

RecordFilePath.description: The filename as it appears in the Uploads folder.

keepBookedOut.description: True to leave the Record checked out after the electronic document is uploaded.

MakeActive.description: Reverts the state of the record (and any of its contents) so that it is no longer inactive. When processing contents you can specify whether the task should halt if any failures occur.

MakeInactive.description: Sets the dateInactive for this record and any of its contents. When processing contents you can specify whether the task should halt if any failures occur.

makeNewRevision.description: True to create a new Revision with this Electronic document false to replace the current Revision.

RecordOtherContact.description: Unique ID or email address of Location

RecordOwnerLocation.description: Unique ID or email address of Location

RecordNewType.description: Leave as Default unless creating a New Part Version or Copy.

propertySets.description: Specify Property Sets in addition to those posted to be returned by the request.

q.description: Specify a query here to apply the update to a set of Records rather than only one (as specified by the Unique ID).
Enter a search query, e.g. 'all' to get all objects.

ApplyDefaults.description: True to apply the user's default filter and sort to this search.

CountResults.description: CountResults returns the most reliable and the slowest count of the total search results. The resulting count is in the response Count property.

DescendantProperties.description: A comma separated list of object properties, applies only to object properties of this and lower level properties e.g. RecordNumber,RecordTitle.

ExcludeCount.description: Returning the TotalResults and SearchTitle can degrade performance. Set to true if TotalResults and SearchTitle are not required.

Filter.description: A space separated list of search clauses to apply as a filter.

FromSearch.description: The Unique ID of a Saved Search from which to construct this search.

IncludePropertyDefs.description: True to return an array of the Property Definitions used by properties in this response.

Options.description: Set one or more of the options typically set in User Options for this search only.  Use ids from the /PropertyDef?Get=SearchOptions service, append a minus sign to set to false, otherwise true is assumed.

pageSize.description: The number of items to return in each page of results. If empty, defaults to default value set in configuration.

PropertyValue.description: Include the raw value, the string value, or both in the results.

PropertySets.description: One or more pre-defined property sets, select from DataGridVisible, Detailed, FromSearch, All or a custom property set as defined in your service configuration.

purpose.description: A special property to filter search results based on object Purpose enum values.

purposeExtra.description: Necessary as a supplement to some purposes.  The ObjectDef service provides information on the enum or TrimMainObject type to specify, in particular ObjectDef.ExtraPurposeEnums, ObjectDef.ExtraPurposeObjectTypes and HaveExtraPurposeParameter.

sortBy.description: A comma separated list of search clause Ids.  Use - to specify descending.  E.g. `Number-` to sort Records by number descending.

start.description: The position in the result set to start, empty (or 1) to start at the beginning, 2 to start at the second object, 3 at the third, etc.

StringDisplayType.title: StringDisplayType
StringDisplayType.description: If returning the string value which format to use.
